dmca.title: Cartoonist not amused by Google Groups posting
dmca.body:
Sat, 22 Jul 2006 12:12:58 -0000

Thank you for deleting the messages containing attachments of Julius'
copyrighted materials. Unfortunately, that has not stopped this Group owner.
He has posted more copyrighted drawings. [I have also found some postings
that I missed in the previous complaint which I include here as well.]

And although the messages have been removed from his site, you must
understand that all of the members of this Google Group who elected to
receive individual emails rather than check the postings on the website,
received all of these drawings in their email boxes when the postings were
first distributed to the members' email addresses. And as long as this
Google Group owner continues to post copyrighted drawings, the illegality of
his actions is only mitigated by the removal of the messages. Consequently,
Julius and I request that you take more postitive action with this Group,
smilar to the action that the Yahoo Copyright Agent takes in cases of repeat
violations (i.e., close the Group).

Here are the details of the current postings:

1. The copyrighted work is pages from the following books, illustrated by
Julius who is my business parter at Juliart Productions, and who is the
legal copyright owner: Devils Canyon, Part I, "Glominus Files",
and "Erection Crew".

2. All of the copyrighted material relating to the above books appear in the
Google Group Art-Cartoon-smoking-men and all of the URLs for each of the
postings containing copyrighted drawings can be found by performing the a
search of that Google Groups posting using the following
search: http://groups.google.com/group/Art-Cartoon-smoking-men/search?
group=Art-Cartoon-smoking-men&q=J+-+&qt_g=1&searchnow=Search+this+group
There are 11 postings from a Google Group member who calls himself
Toon Hound.

Per your instructions in an email to me, here is the Message ID information
for all of these pages:

Erection Crew
Message-Id: < 20060629114546.4FB0ADA824@mailserver7.hushmail.com>
Message-Id: < 20060701121724.47400DA820@mailserver8.hushmail.com>

Devils Canyon, Part I
Message-Id: < 20060623145014.3E4A9DA826@mailserver8.hushmail.com>

Greek Story
Message-Id: < 20060525132322.4152FDA821@mailserver8.hushmail.com>

Glominus Files
Message-Id: < 200607211140.k6LBe2Zr005154@mailserver3.hushmail.com>
Message-Id: < 200607211137.k6LBbwbX005072@mailserver3.hushmail.com>
Message-Id: < 200607211137.k6LBbJTT005049@mailserver3.hushmail.com>
Message-Id: < 200607211140.k6LBem1K005193@mailserver3.hushmail.com>
Message-Id: < 200607211139.k6LBdOAb005121@mailserver3.hushmail.com>
Message-Id: < 200607211138.k6LBcc5x005102@mailserver3.hushmail.com>
Message-Id: < 200607211133.k6LBX8Ch004944@mailserver3.hushmail.com>

3. My contact information is:
[private]
[private]
Salem, NH 03079
[private]
email me at: [private]@juliustoons.com

4. The person posting these was the same individual who posted the other
100+ copyrighted pages, and uses the email address: [private]@hushmail.com.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the
owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. Here is my signature:

[private]
